name: http://maps.southoxon.gov.uk/arcgis/services
description: ArcGIS map services hosted by South Oxfordshire District Council, providing geospatial data and web map layers, likely for planning, local infrastructure, and civic services.
owner_subregion_iso3166_2: GB-ENG (England, as regional breakdown not ISO 3166-2 for South Oxfordshire; the correct full ISO would be county-specific, e.g. OXON for Oxfordshire, but 'GB-ENG' is used as admin level 1)
